featured.text: I even have some stuff made out of bamboo/cotton blend.
Participants, often dressed in light cotton kimonos, are encouraged to dance to the music around the stage.
The rest is cotton, nylon, polyester...you name it.
He first tried cotton, but it proved too soft and could not withstand repeated openings and closures.

definition.zh_def: 棉花，一種柔軟的天然纖維，常用於製作布料和衣物。
definition.en_def: A soft, natural fiber obtained from the cotton plant, commonly used to make textiles and clothing.
definition.example: She wore a comfortable cotton shirt on the hot summer day.
